summary: This is an email from attorney Sigrid McCawley to an unnamed recipient, forwarding contact from an anonymous woman who claims to have highly sensitive information and physical evidence about Epstein and Maxwell, but is fearful for her safety and hesitant to share details. McCawley provides the recipient's contact information to the source.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who was contacted by an anonymous woman with information about Epstein/Maxwell and forwarded the contact to another recipient.

events.title: Attorney forwards tip about Epstein/Maxwell evidence
events.description: Sigrid McCawley emails an unnamed recipient about being contacted by an anonymous woman who claims to have highly sensitive information and physical evidence about Epstein and Maxwell, but is scared for her safety.

locations: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200, Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301
keyFacts: An anonymous woman contacted attorney Sigrid McCawley claiming to have highly sensitive information about Epstein and Maxwell.
The source indicated she has physical evidence including pictures.
The source expressed being very scared for her safety and hesitant to come forward.
McCawley forwarded the contact to another recipient, providing that recipient's email and asking for a contact phone number to share with the source.
The email is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege protections.
